item.title: Need help on this compiler from a source
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It Says This:

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 07:45:39 am[/size][hr]can anyone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on this compiler from a source

item.title: Need help on this compiler from a source
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Try this one:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
